name: Sass
description:
This is the syntax highlighting mode for Sass (http://haml.hamptoncatlin.com/) -- Syntactically Awesome StyleSheets

Screenshot: http://www.flickr.com/photos/dmitryilyashevich/1006425093/
install_details:
put it into syntax directory and add sass filetype

au! BufRead,BufNewFile *.sass         setfiletype sass

in your filetype.vim
